criteria: E2E tests for Registration and Login are passing. Core calculator UI is functional and responsive. No critical bugs in the authentication flow.
success_metrics: User can successfully register and log in. Basic calculations are correct.

criteria: All new backend endpoints enforce user-scoped data access. Integration tests prove User A cannot access User B's data. All unit tests pass with >85% coverage.
Secure Lambda sandbox implementation passes security review. All tests for preventing sandbox escape are passing. P95 latency for formula execution is under 500ms.
success_metrics: No identified sandbox escape vectors. Performance NFR is met.

criteria: E2E tests for offline data synchronization, including conflict resolution, are passing. GDPR data export flow is functional and secure.
success_metrics: Zero data loss scenarios identified in testing.

criteria: Application passes full WCAG 2.1 Level AA audit (automated and manual). No critical or serious accessibility violations remain.
success_metrics: 100% compliance with WCAG 2.1 AA for all core user flows.
